text: konege avaru ataninda nirasaradaga samalocisalendu seri kulitaru. Avarallina hiriyanu helidanu; nim'ma tande allahana hesaralli nim'minda pakvavada vacanavannu padediddarendu hagu i hinde yusuphana visayadalli nivu adentaha tappu madiddirendu nimage tiliyade? Nanantu nanna tande nanage anumati niduva tanaka athava allahane nanage ondu adesavannu niduva tanaka i nelavannu bittu misukadalare. Avanu atyuttama tirpu niduvavanagiddane
